channel.title: Games on Seyyid Dogan
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Seyyid Dogan

item.title: Games That I Recommend
item.description: Must Plays: Psychonauts 1 Psychonauts 2 Return of the Obra Dinn Celeste (The 2020 Celeste Spring Community Collab and The Secret of Celeste Mountain looks great if you have finished the base game) It Takes Two The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past We Were Here (whole franchise) A Short Hike Hi-Fi Rush Should Plays: Happenlance Sekiro Towerfall Ascension Remnant: From the Ashes Helldivers Starbound SteamWorld Dig 2 Trackmania(2020, United Forever) Magicka Magicka 2 Heave Ho Nidhogg Lumino City & Lume INK Br√ºtal Legend Life is Strange The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild FEZ Astroneer Risk of Rain 2 (with lots of mods) Golf with your friends Tabletop Simulator Arma 3 (with an arma clan, with lots of mods, never play alone)
